src_original: oṁ namā bhagavati vajavārā hi āryya parājite trailokya mātre mahāvaidye sarvvabhūta yāvaha mahāvaja vajāmane ajite parājite vaśāṁkarane (223)
tatrāmaṇi viṣaṇāṣani roṣani kroḍhanika jñāniṇi santrāsani mārini sūprabhedani parājaya virājaya jambhanistambhani mohani vajavārohi mahāyogiṇī kāmeśvari khaṁgeśvari ||

pātrarge 2 hana 2 pāśānakhikhini dhanū 2 vajahastā śoṣaya 2 khadvārga kapāradhāraṇi mahāpātra pravite sārddhanaraśira mālāgratkita dhāraṇi sūmbhahana 2 prāṇāna sarvva satvānāṁ sarvvapya pasatvānāṁ sarvva paśunāṁ māṁsacchedani krāḍha mūttidraṣṭā kajñālini mahāmūdrāḥ śrī he kasyāgra mahiṣisahasra śiresahasra vāhavaiśata sahasrānavyajvalita tejasya kālāmūkhi |
gra gra hū ha ha haṁ bhi ma hahasa 2 vilaṣya 2 hā 2 hū 2 trailoka vināsaniśatahasrakophaṭi tathāgata paripāterite hū phaṭa ||
siṁha ruṣyagaḥ gajaruṣya (224)  gaḥ rājaruṣya vrailokya da mahamūdra rośanegrasa 2 hū pha vīcāddhe te hū hā 2 mahāyaśu mahāniyā gauritvaṁ ḍākiṇi lokānāṁ vandani saṁghaḥ pratyaya kālini hū pha ||
bhūta trāsani mahāvīra parama siddha vidyai hū hū phaṭ phaṭ hū hū phaṭ phaṭ svāhā ||

oṁ sarva ṣṭāna hū phaṭ ||  oṁ namaḥ sarvva bhūta bhayāvahe mahāvaje hū hū phaṭ ||  oṁ namo vajāsana akṣite aparājite vaśvaṁkara netratomani hū hū phaṭ |  oṁ namaḥ jayāvijayā jambha nimbha vi mohāni (225) hū hū phaṭ ||
